Construct AWS S3 Call

Source: R/make_aws_call.R
make_aws_call.Rd

Constructs GET information string for AWS S3 Bucket

make_aws_call(
  path_to_file = "/",
  bucket = "hcp-openaccess",
  region = "us-east-1",
  access_key = NULL,
  secret_key = NULL,
  lifetime_minutes = 5,
  query = NULL,
  verb = "GET",
  sign = TRUE
)

Arguments

path_to_file

Path to file on HCP S3 Bucket
bucket

Bucket to download from
region

Region of S3 Bucket
access_key

Amazon S3 Access Key
secret_key

Amazon S3 Secret Key
lifetime_minutes

Time that connection can be opened
query

additional query to add to verb command
verb

httr VERB to be used
sign

Should the url be signed?

Value

Character of the url to be passed to httr `VERB`s

Examples

if (have_aws_key()){
path_to_file <- paste0(
   "HCP_900/100206/MNINonLinear/",
   "100206.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec")
result = make_aws_call(path_to_file)
# don't want this stuff printed because it has keys
result$headers$secret_key = NULL
result$headers$access_key = NULL
result$query$AWSAccessKeyId = NULL
result$query$Signature = NULL
result
}
#> $url
#> [1] "https://hcp-openaccess.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/"
#> 
#> $path
#> [1] "HCP_900/100206/MNINonLinear/100206.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec"
#> 
#> $query
#> $query$Expires
#> [1] 1603111733
#> 
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$default_region
#> [1] "us-east-1"
#> 
#> 
#> attr(,"canonical_string")
#> [1] "GET\n\n\n1603111733\n/HCP_900/100206/MNINonLinear/100206.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec"
